Note: Signed "U Finozzi." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "R. & C." appears on the bottom left of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in Italian says to chase them away, subscribe to the Loan. Illustration shows a women holding a child, and pushing away a man in uniform who is the enemy.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Cacciali Via!
